title: Manage Lab Reagent Inventory
description: A lab manager needs to check the inventory of a critical reagent, notice it is low, and order more.

tasks.description: Check the current stock level of 'Reagent ABC' in the lab inventory system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the stock level is below the predefined reorder threshold.

tasks.description: Find the approved supplier and catalog number for 'Reagent ABC'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the correct supplier and ordering information.

tasks.description: Create a purchase order for a new lot of the reagent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates a purchase order in the procurement system.

tasks.description: Upon receipt, log the new lot into the inventory system and update the stock level.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the inventory with the new lot number, quantity, and expiration date.
